extendedInfo.description: Manage your personal expenses and take control of your finance.Money Box Expenses is a simple and free application that helps you to save money and organize your balance account taking notes about your daily cash flow.You can simply register your expenses and incomes by date and category, view graphs reports ( pie charts ) and export data as CSV file to be imported in Excel.It's easy and safe and all your personal finance are password protected!You can edit and filter every expenses as you need, categories can be edited and created as you want.Money Box Expenses supports the following currencies: Dollars, Euro, Pound, Yen.Completely user friendly, you can browse this application sliding from screens or jumping from a page to another.Features include:â¦ Translated in English and Italianâ¦ Configure your Currenciesâ¦ Password protectionâ¦ Graph by Category and periodâ¦ Export file to your SD card as .CSVâ¦ Set initial balanceâ¦ Install to SD cardâ¦ Create and rename Categoriesâ¦ Edit your recordsâ¦ Share the application with your friendsâ¦ No internet registration requiredAbout Permissions:- Internet access is required to load ads banner- SD card access is required to export your data if you need to.Note:This is the first release of the program, follow updates with new features. For suggestions email me, thanks.Keywords: money box, budget manager, expense manager, save money, payment, cash, bills, finance, wallet, bank account, currency, euro, dollar, pound, secure notes, balance account, administration.
